mapper.select: select wi.id as id, wi.in_name as inName, wi.in_specifications as inSpecifications, wi.in_cost as inCost, wi.in_qty as inQty, wi.in_pricing as inPricing, wi.in_manufacturers as inManufacturers, wp.parts_name as inPart from w_instock wi left join w_parts wp on wp.id=wi.in_part where wi.id=#{ids2}
mapper.update: update w_instock set in_name =#{inName}, in_specifications=#{inSpecifications}, in_cost =#{inCost}, in_qty =#{inQty}, in_pricing =#{inPricing}, in_manufacturers =#{inManufacturers}, in_part =#{inPart}, in_updatetime=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id as id, ins_name as inName, ins_qty as inQty from w_instrument_information where ins_name=#{inName} and ins_specifications=#{inSpecifications} and ins_manufacturers=#{inManufacturers}
select id as id, parts_name as inName, parts_qty as inQty from w_parts where parts_name=#{inName} and parts_specifications=#{inSpecifications} and parts_manufacturers=#{inManufacturers}
mapper.update: update w_instrument_information set ins_qty =#{inQty}, ins_cost=#{insCost}, ins_parts=#{insParts}, ins_pricing=#{insPricing}, ins_updatetime=now() where ins_name=#{inName}
update w_parts set parts_qty =#{inQty}, parts_cost=#{inCost}, parts_pricing=#{inPricing}, parts_updatetime=now() where parts_name=#{inName}
